description:
At the start of your Herbling's turn, it {ACTION_casts} [icons,1976]Cruelty of the Wild. This spell has 20% more potency for each of your Herbling's Tiers.

Cruelty of the Wild: Enemies are afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}. If they are already afflicted with this debuff, they instead recover a moderate amount of {STAT_health}.
name: Angry Orchard
